## Variables.getOrCreateVariablePackage() function

Helper function to look up or create a variable on the given workspace. If no variable exists, creates and returns it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getOrCreateVariablePackage(workspace: Workspace, id: string | null, opt_name?: string, opt_type?: string): VariableModel;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to search for the variable. It may be a flyout workspace or main workspace. |
|  id | string \| null | The ID to use to look up or create the variable, or null. |
|  opt\_name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The string to use to look up or create the variable. |
|  opt\_type | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The type to use to look up or create the variable.  The variable corresponding to the given ID or name + type combination.  Blockly.Variables.getOrCreateVariablePackage |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel.md)
